content: Then he called the bridegroom aside and said, "Everyone brings out the choice wine first and then the cheaper wine after the guests have had too much to drink, but you have saved the best till now."
translations: ita:Poi prese in disparte lo sposo e gli disse﹕ Tutti offrono per primo il vino di qualità migliore, lasciando quello più ec
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
